articles.description: Along with former under-23 teammates Callum O'Hare and Jake Doyle-Hayes, Hepburn-Murphy will leave Villa Park once his contract expires on June 30
articles.content:
Rushian Hepburn-Murphy has posted a message to Aston Villa supporters after his departure was confirmed.
The 21-year-old striker was among the 14 players on Villa's released list which was revealed … [+1033 chars]
